name: Save the Earth (khrysller)
description:
Earth is in danger and only you can save us from extinction. Vulkron is about to change what Earth is used to be. Join us in this journey and Save the Earth.

How to Play:
★ Watch the story
★ Tap to start the game and tap anywhere to change the Earth direction
★ Each tap grants you a +1 in your score
★ Collect as much animals as possible in your way

Main Features:
★ 3D and isometric graphics
★ Beautiful story
★ Totally Free!
★ Collect animals in your way
★ Trophies
★ Ranking
★ Pleasant soundtrack and sound effects
★ Highly addictive
